biotools.summary: DIscBIO is a user-friendly pipeline for biomarker discovery in single-cell transcriptomics. An open, multi-algorithmic pipeline for easy, fast and efficient analysis of cellular sub-populations and the molecular signatures that characterize them.

bioschemas.name: DIscBIO
bioschemas.summary: DIscBIO is a user-friendly pipeline for biomarker discovery in single-cell transcriptomics. An open, multi-algorithmic pipeline for easy, fast and efficient analysis of cellular sub-populations and the molecular signatures that characterize them.
